data.title: Ferguson (name)
data.text:
For other uses, see Ferguson.

FergusonOriginMeaning"son of Fergus"Region of originScotlandOther namesVariant form(s)Clan Fergusson

Ferguson is an Anglicization of the Scots Gaelic "Macfhearghus", a patronymic form of the personal name Fergus which translates as son of the angry (one).[1]
